entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
